function.name: GetBoloDetails
function.description: Fetches Bolo details with specified vehicle characteristics.

offset.description: The number of results to skip before starting to return results. Defaults to 0.

limit.description: The maximum number of results to return. Defaults to 10.

make.description: The make of the vehicle (e.g., Ford, Toyota).

apiQuery.query:
query BoloDetails($make: String!$model: String$limit: Int = 10$offset: Int = 0) {
BoloDetails(make: $make, model: $model, limit: $limit, offset: $offset) {
bolo_id
vehicle_id
issue_date
status
last_updated
make
model
year
registration_state
registration_number
license_state
driver_id
}

}

function.name: GetDriver
function.description: Retrieves driver information using their license number.

offset.description: The number of results to skip before starting to return results. Defaults to 0.

license_number.description: The license number of the driver.

limit.description: The maximum number of results to return. Defaults to 10.

apiQuery.query:
query Driver($license_number: String!$limit: Int = 10$offset: Int = 0$bolos_limit: Int = 10$bolos_offset: Int = 0$vehicles_limit: Int = 10$vehicles_offset: Int = 0$vehicles_bolos_limit: Int = 10$vehicles_bolos_offset: Int = 0$vehicles_tracking_limit: Int = 10$vehicles_tracking_offset: Int = 0$warrants_limit: Int = 10$warrants_offset: Int = 0) {
Driver(license_number: $license_number, limit: $limit, offset: $offset) {
driver_id
first_name
last_name
license_number
license_state
date_of_birth
license_status
license_expiry_date
last_updated
bolos(limit: $bolos_limit, offset: $bolos_offset) {
bolo_id
vehicle_id
issue_date
status
last_updated
make
model
year
registration_state
registration_number
license_state
driver_id
}
vehicles(limit: $vehicles_limit, offset: $vehicles_offset) {
vehicle_id
registration_number
registration_state
registration_expiry
make
model
year
owner_driver_id
last_updated
bolos(limit: $vehicles_bolos_limit, offset: $vehicles_bolos_offset) {
bolo_id
vehicle_id
issue_date
status
last_updated
make
model
year
registration_state
registration_number
license_state
driver_id
}
tracking(limit: $vehicles_tracking_limit, offset: $vehicles_tracking_offset) {
latitude
longitude
event_time
}
}
warrants(limit: $warrants_limit, offset: $warrants_offset) {
warrant_id
person_id
warrant_status
crime_description
state_of_issuance
issue_date
last_updated
}
}

}

function.name: GetVehicle
function.description: Retrieves vehicle details using the registration number.

offset.description: The number of results to skip before starting to return results. Defaults to 0.

registration_number.description: The registration number of the vehicle, i.e. the license plate number.

limit.description: The maximum number of results to return. Defaults to 10.

apiQuery.query:
query Vehicle($registration_number: String!$limit: Int = 10$offset: Int = 0$bolos_limit: Int = 10$bolos_offset: Int = 0$tracking_limit: Int = 10$tracking_offset: Int = 0) {
Vehicle(registration_number: $registration_number, limit: $limit, offset: $offset) {
vehicle_id
registration_number
registration_state
registration_expiry
make
model
year
owner_driver_id
last_updated
bolos(limit: $bolos_limit, offset: $bolos_offset) {
bolo_id
vehicle_id
issue_date
status
last_updated
make
model
year
registration_state
registration_number
license_state
driver_id
}
tracking(limit: $tracking_limit, offset: $tracking_offset) {
latitude
longitude
event_time
}
}

}

function.name: GetWarrantsByCrime
function.description: Fetches statistics on warrants filtered by the type of crime.

function.name: GetWarrantsByState
function.description: Fetches statistics on warrants issued by state filtered by their status.

status.description: The status of the warrant (one of: active, urgent, closed, suspended).

function.name: GetBolosByWeekState
function.description:
Fetches Bolo (be on the lookout) statistics by week filtered by state. It returns the data ordered
by week starting from the most recent and going backwards from there.

offset.description: The number of results to skip before starting to return results. Defaults to 0.

limit.description:
The maximum number of results to return. Defaults to 100. Set to the number of past weeks to return
multiplied by the number of states.

state.description: The state for which Bolos are to be fetched abbreviated to two uppercase letters (e.g. WA, CA).
